article.title: U.S. Navy Awards $21 Million for P-8A Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, Seattle, Washington, is being awarded a contract modification valued at about $21 million for long lead materials in support of low-rate initial production of seven lot two P-8A multi-mission maritime aircraft.Â The Naval Air System Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
